languages.text: "Да будет так. Во имя посрамления неверующих дарую тебе благословение особого допуска и опеку от буйства Движущей силы". {n}Из стен крипты доносится сухой треск пробудившихся когитаторов, обрабатывающих приказ древнего техножреца.{/n}

"So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да будет так. Во имя посрамления неверующих дарую тебе благословение особого допуска и опеку от буйства Движущей силы". {n}Из стен крипты доносится сухой треск пробудившихся когитаторов, обрабатывающих приказ древнего техножреца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So be it. In order that the unbelievers be brought low, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

"So be it. In order that the unbelievers be brought low, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

"So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

"So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

"So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

"So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

languages.text: "So sei es. Um die Ungläubigen zu beschämen, gewähre ich Euch den Segen des besonderen Zugangs sowie Schutz vor dem Zorn der Antriebskraft." {n}Ein trockenes Knistern ertönt aus dem Inneren der Wände der Krypta, als erweckte Cogitator den Befehl des uralten Techpriesters verarbeiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So sei es. Um die Ungläubigen zu beschämen, gewähre ich Euch den Segen des besonderen Zugangs sowie Schutz vor dem Zorn der Antriebskraft." {n}Ein trockenes Knistern ertönt aus dem Inneren der Wände der Krypta, als erweckte Cogitator den Befehl des uralten Techpriesters verarbeiten.{/n}

languages.text: « Qu'il en soit ainsi. Afin de jeter l'opprobre sur les mécréants, je vous accorde ma bénédiction d'accès spécial qui vous protégera contre la fureur de la Force Motrice. » {n}Des craquements semblent sortir des murs de la crypte, alors que des cogitateurs s'animent sur ordre du vieux technoprêtre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qu'il en soit ainsi. Afin de jeter l'opprobre sur les mécréants, je vous accorde ma bénédiction d'accès spécial qui vous protégera contre la fureur de la Force Motrice. » {n}Des craquements semblent sortir des murs de la crypte, alors que des cogitateurs s'animent sur ordre du vieux technoprêtre.{/n}

languages.text: “就这样吧。以惩戒不敬者之名，我予你受祝的特权，保护你免受源力之怒的伤害。”{n}干裂的噼啪声从地下室的墙壁里传来，被唤醒的沉思者开始处理古代技术神甫的命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “就这样吧。以惩戒不敬者之名，我予你受祝的特权，保护你免受原初动力之怒的伤害。”{n}干裂的噼啪声从地下室的墙壁里传来，被唤醒的思考器开始处理古代技术祭司的命令。{/n}

languages.text: 「仕方ない。不信心者に恥を教えるという名目で、動力の憤怒による特別な権利と加護をお前に授ける」{n}カラカラとした音が安置所の壁の内側で響く。起動した考算機が太古の技術司祭の命令を処理しているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「仕方ない。不信心者に恥を教えるという名目で、動力の憤怒による特別な権利と加護をお前に授ける」{n}カラカラとした音が安置所の壁の内側で響く。起動した考算機が太古の技術司祭の命令を処理しているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: «Que así sea. En nombre de la vergüenza de los infieles, le concedo la bendición de acceso especial y protección contra la furia de la Fuerza Motriz». {n}Sonidos secos de crujidos provienen del interior de las paredes de la cripta, mientras los cogitadores despiertos procesan la orden del antiguo Tecnosacerdote.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Que así sea. En nombre de la vergüenza de los infieles, le concedo la bendición de acceso especial y protección contra la furia de la Fuerza Motriz». {n}Sonidos secos de crujidos provienen del interior de las paredes de la cripta, mientras los cogitadores despiertos procesan la orden del antiguo Tecnosacerdote.{/n}

languages.text: "Öyle olsun. İnançsızların yüzünü kızartmak adına sana özel erişim ve Devinim Gücü'nün öfkesine karşı koruma lütfu bahşediyorum." {n}Uyanan kavramsayarlar kadim Tekno Rahip'in emrini işlerken, mahzenin duvarlarından kuru çatırtılar duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. In the name of shaming the unbelievers, I grant you the blessing of special access and protection from the rage of the Motive Force." {n}Dry cracking sounds come from inside the crypt's walls as awakened cogitators process the ancient Tech-Priest's command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyle olsun. İnançsızların yüzünü kızartmak adına sana özel erişim ve Devinim Gücü'nün öfkesine karşı koruma lütfu bahşediyorum." {n}Uyanan kavramsayarlar kadim Tekno Rahip'in emrini işlerken, mahzenin duvarlarından kuru çatırtılar duyuluyor.{/n}
